TextView.android:text: Does the child move both arms and both legs freely equally when awake or when excited.
Does the child raise his or her Head momentarily when lying face down?
Does the child keep his hands open and relaxed most of the time>(By 3 months)
Does the child respond to your voice or startles with ' loud sounds or becomes alert to new sound by quietening or smiling?
Does the Child coos or able to vocalize other than crying? Like 'ooh','ng'
